lines.text: We've angered them. There's going to be repercussions.
People - they get trapped in their own history unless someone shows them a way out.
Everything can be broken down to numbers. Science will be earth's salvation.
I like Ike" is a secret gentile code for "I hate kikes."
My uncle told me there are only eight trustworthy people in the entire world. There were twelve, but four were assassinated.
He doesn't know what he believes. My brothers filled him with all that junk.
[refering to his son reading the Torah]

Maybe they're right for once. What would you know? You work ten hours a day and then you lock yourself in that workshop. What do you know about the world? Maybe there is a God, or maybe some of us want to believe there is.
Religion is a crutch. Only cripples need crutches.
A crutch isn't bad if you need it, Sidney.
All of us are cripples in some way.
Well, I'm not.
What's the highest number?
Want to know why? That's how much is in my bank account.
Oh my god Selma; you look like death.
And there are demented schmucks who are not welcome.
I can't eat these.
Why not?
They look like doodie cakes.

[Danny is heckling a rival of his nephew Franz who, in his speech for the school presidential elections, is repeatedly insulting Franz]
Fascist hatemonger! That boy is a Hitler in the making! A Hitler in the making!

[Stands up angrily]
That's my son you're talking about!
Meet Hitler's father.
